summary: The Promoting and Respecting Economically Vital American Innovation Leadership Act (PREVAIL Act) aims to amend Title 35 of the United States Code, focusing on patent law reform. The bill addresses issues related to the Patent Trial and Appeal Board (PTAB), inter partes review, post-grant review, and reexamination of patents. It intends to strengthen patent protections, combat perceived abuses of the patent system, and ensure the U.S. remains a leader in innovation by amending various sections of title 35 to address issues such as post-grant reviews, and the role of the USPTO.
